refnamediv.refpurpose: Defines another "if...then" condition when a "if...then" condition is false.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Defines another "if...then" condition when a "if...then" condition is false.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where label is in the same instrument block and is not an expression, and where R is one of the Relational operators (<, =, <=, ==, !=) (and = for convenience, see also under Conditional Values).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: elseif is used inside of a block of code between the "if...then" and endif opcodes. When a "if...then" condition is false, it defines another "if...then" condition to be met. Any number of elseif statements are allowed.
